translation.en: [man 2] So what do you think, Joe?
I don’t know.
I don’t think that’s for me to say.
translation.fr: C’est pas à moi de dire.

translation.en: A second chance?
I mean, it’s a nice idea, but...
But?
-How do you feel? -Feel?
I feel that I was a nightmare.
translation.fr: Comme si j’avais été dans un cauchemar.

translation.en: I made terrible choices.
I drove my family away. I--
I hurt people.
I didn’t mean to, but there it is.
And for all that...
there’s a hole inside me now.
translation.fr: pour avoir ce vide à l’intérieur.

translation.en: It hurts. I carry it.
Like Phil Coakley hurts?
Of course not.
But I know the work I’ve done. You’ve seen that.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que j’ai fait. Toi aussi.

translation.en: Yeah.
-Yeah. I have. -Right.
I got almost six years.
That’s real.
That’s clarity.
I can’t do anything about before. That’s done.
translation.fr: Le passé, j’y peux rien. C’est fait.

translation.en: But I can show people I’ve changed.
translation.fr: Je peux montrer que j’ai changé.

translation.en: Like with my behavior.
And my girls.
I can be their father again.
And that’s what you want?
That’s all there is.
A second chance.
Why not?
I have faith in you, Joe.
-Thank you, Morris. -[door buzzes]
[guard] Let’s go.
Would you like to take communion before you go?
translation.fr: Tu veux communier avant d’y aller ?

translation.en: Oh, no. I’m good.
-[Joe] Keep the change. -Thanks.
[man] Mother’s got her soup line today late.
translation.fr: Maman est à la soupe populaireaujourd’hui.

translation.en: I think we expected to see you next week.
-Ah, she’d have meant to be here. -It’s okay.
translation.fr: - Sinon, elle aurait été là.- Ça va.

translation.en: Well, she’d have meant to be here.
-[Joe] Wait. Here. -[grunts]
Retired, huh?
Yeah. I couldn’t hump the lines anymore.
Look, uh, you know, such a long trip up there
translation.fr: Écoute, le voyage est long, tu sais,

translation.en: and my back being what it is.
translation.fr: et vu l’état de mon dos.

translation.en: -I know. -Still, we should have.
translation.fr: - Je sais.- On aurait quand même dû y aller.

translation.en: -I just, uh-- -I know.
They brought some of your stuff back when they closed your apartment.
translation.fr: On a les trucs de ton appartement.

translation.en: It’s downstairs in your space if you wanna--
translation.fr: C’est en bas si tu veux...

translation.en: Sure.
Hey, baby.
I missed you too.
[automated voice] The number you’ve reached is not in service--
-[Joe] Where’d they move to? -[man] We don’t know.
We haven’t spoken to Elaine since you went up.
translation.fr: Elaine a disparu depuis ta condamnation.

translation.en: [Joe] What about the girls? Birthdays? Christmas?
translation.fr: Et les filles ? Les annivs ? Noël ?

translation.en: We are not in touch anymore.
-You never called? -She wouldn’t accept ’em.
translation.fr: - T’as appelé ?- Elle refuse mes appels.

translation.en: Well, she’s not obligated to.
The settlement was clear--
Whoa, whoa, whoa. I contested that fucking settlement.
translation.fr: J’ai contesté ce putain de jugement.

translation.en: A clean break now, Joe, while the girls are young.
translation.fr: Les filles sont jeunes,elle veut repartir à zéro.

translation.en: It’s a shame, but maybe she’s right.
translation.fr: C’est malheureux,mais elle a peut-être raison.

translation.en: Can I borrow the truck?
-Your mother will be home-- -Dad.
I’ve been indoors six years. Please.
translation.fr: J’ai été enfermé six ans. Je t’en prie.

translation.en: Melissa?
Yeah?
It’s Daddy, sweetie.
It’s your dad.
My dad? Uh-huh.
How are you, baby?
Hmm. Good.
How’s your sister?
She’s okay.
That’s great.
Um, you know, I--
I’ve been away because... Well, I had to be away.
translation.fr: Je suis parti parce que...Il fallait que je parte.

translation.en: It wasn’t my fault.
Well, it was, but I was sick and...
translation.fr: Ça l’était, mais j’étais malade et...

translation.en: But now-- now I’m better, see, and we--
translation.fr: Mais là... là, je vais mieux et on...

translation.en: Can you hold on?
Melissa. Melissa, wait. Wait. I love you.
[woman] Joe?
Hey, sweetie.
How did you get this number?
I know. I just wanted to talk to the girls.
translation.fr: Je voulais juste parler aux filles.

translation.en: Joe, you know that’s not allowed.
-I should be able to speak to my-- -Listen to me.
translation.fr: - J’ai le droit de...- Écoute-moi bien.

translation.en: You’re violating your agreement.
Agreement?
-You call again... -Why are you--
...I’ll press charges.
Well, this is--
Joe’s such a bad boy.
-[man] Sucker. -[Joe] Sorry. Sorry.
Joe motherfuckin’ Denton.
-Shit. Scotty. Look at you. -Look at you.
translation.fr: - Merde. Scotty. Regarde-toi.- Et toi donc.

translation.en: Goddamn. It’s good to see you.
Uh, get one, and put that on mine.
translation.fr: Un autre et celui-là, c’est pour ma pomme.

translation.en: -That’s kind of you, man. Cheers. -Oh, it’s the least I can do.
translation.fr: - C’est gentil. Santé.- C’est le minimum.

translation.en: It’s the least I can do, man.
I figure you and Billy were-- you were like brothers,
translation.fr: Billy et toi étiez... comme des frères alors, nous aussi...

translation.en: so that makes us like brothers, so...
translation.fr: comme des frères alors, nous aussi...

translation.en: -Hey. -To bein’ home.
And to my brother Billy.
To home and to Billy.
I-- I just-- I wanted to say hey, welcome you back.
translation.fr: Je voulais... juste saluer ton retour.

translation.en: If you need anything...
-Thanks, man. Good to see ya. -Give me a call.
You know, I come in here a lot,
and I’m pretty sure I’ve never seen you before.
translation.fr: et je suis sûre de vous avoir jamais vu.

translation.en: I’m new.
-New used, maybe. -Mm-hmm.
But it’s what’s under the hood that counts.
Not the paint job. The ride is just so--
translation.fr: Pas la carrosserie. - La conduite est si...- Je vois. Les bagnoles.

translation.en: I get it. Cars.
translation.fr: - La conduite est si...- Je vois. Les bagnoles.

translation.en: Enjoyable.
Do you, uh...
wanna buy me a Sucker Punch?
Oh, boy.
I don’t know what that is.
translation.fr: Je sais même pas ce que c’est.

translation.en: Drinks.
-[woman] Now what? -[laughs]
No, I, uh-- I gotta go home.
-[woman scoffs] -Yeah. Are you sure?
That’s boring. Wanna give me a ride home at least?
translation.fr: C’est nul. Vous me raccompagnez au moins ?

translation.en: Please.
Pretty please?
Pretty, pretty please?
[Joe] You sure this is the right way?
translation.fr: Tu es sûre que c’est ici ?

translation.en: Yeah. It’s, uh, straight down there.
translation.fr: Oui. C’est... juste un peu plus loin.

translation.en: It’s right over there.
Okay.
You know...
...I thought you were gonna try something with me.
-I’m just giving you a lift. -Hmm.
translation.fr: Je ne fais que te ramener.

translation.en: You didn’t ask my name.
What’s your name?
-[thunder rumbling] -Cara.
Cara Coakley, you motherfucker.
Help! Somebody help me!
Coffee?
I’d say it’s good to see you again, but I feel sick just being this close.
translation.fr: J’aimerais bien être ravi de te voir,mais tu me dégoûtes.

translation.en: -Nice to see you too, Dan. -Lieutenant Pleasant.
Don’t you dare use the informal with me, you fucking degenerate.
translation.fr: Reste formel avec moi, putain de dégénéré.

translation.en: You’re an everlasting disgrace to this department,
translation.fr: Tu es la honte de ce département

translation.en: and if Officer Barnett wasn’t here, I would tune you up myself on general principle.
translation.fr: et sans l’agent Barnett, je te régleraiston cas, juste par principe.

translation.en: Let me ask you something.
Did Manny Vassey or any of his animals visit you inside?
translation.fr: Manny Vassey ou un de ses sbiresa-t-il été te voir en taule ?

translation.en: Was it worth it, selling your soul to them?
translation.fr: Ça a valu la peine de leur vendreton âme ?

translation.en: You Judas fuck.
Where’s the DA?
Isn’t he coming?
Look, Phil, this is not how I want--
translation.fr: Écoute, Phil, je ne voulais pas que...

translation.en: One of those young men is in intensive care.
translation.fr: Un des jeunes est en réa.

translation.en: The one with the nunchakus?
His father is an alderman.
I don’t give a shit if they’re astronauts.
translation.fr: Je m’en fous s’il est astronaute.

translation.en: Charge me.
Put those assholes on the stand and watch ’em come apart like wet bread,
translation.fr: Et regarde bien ces petits consse pisser dessus en cour.

translation.en: because you know exactly what this is.
translation.fr: Tu sais très bien de quoi il s’agit.

translation.en: They’re parked in the middle of nowhere with ninja weapons,
translation.fr: Comme par hasard, ils sont là, armés,

translation.en: precisely where and when their girlfriend happens to get assaulted?
translation.fr: au milieu de nulle part,quand leur copine est agressée ?

translation.en: Come on. Be serious.
Now, your daughter built herself a cute little frame,
translation.fr: Ta fille a monté un joli petit coup,

translation.en: but there’s no way this ends in anything but a civil suit that buys me your fucking house.
translation.fr: mais tout ça se terminera au civilet te coûtera ta baraque.

translation.en: [Phil] You’re right.
I spoke with Cara just now.
She’s, uh, quite shaken by what happened.
translation.fr: Elle a été secouée par tout ça.

translation.en: She’s been, uh, angry lately.
translation.fr: Elle est... révoltée depuis un moment.

translation.en: She, uh...
Do you wish to press charges?
In light of the statement given by my--
translation.fr: Suite à la déclaration de ma...

translation.en: regarding the events of this evening...
you have the right to press criminal battery charges against the men who attacked you,
translation.fr: tu peux porter plaintecontre tes agresseurs...

translation.en: -and my office will issue arrest warrants. -[Joe] Hmm.
Ah, forget it. It’s in the past.
If I could change what happened, I would.
translation.fr: Si je pouvais changer le passé,je le ferais.

translation.en: But I paid my time.
I just want everything to stay in the past.
translation.fr: Je veux juste que tout restedans le passé.

translation.en: Like you want Billy Caldwell to stay in the past?
You’re batting zero, shithead.
Goddamn, I miss high school.
I just passed a kid in the lot molesting his girlfriend in the backseat of his ’82 Datsun.
translation.fr: J’ai passé un gamin qui harcelait sa nanasur le siège arrière de sa caisse.

translation.en: Kind of impressed that Phil’s kid went for hard stuff like that.
She always seemed like kind of a flake to me.
translation.fr: Je la croyais moins hard que ça.

translation.en: But then the mother did leave after the, uh-- [whooshing]
translation.fr: Mais bon, sa mère est partie après le...

translation.en: So that’s gotta be kind of rough.
translation.fr: Alors, ça n’a pas dû être facile.

translation.en: You look like you lost a little weight. Usually all that starchy food they--
translation.fr: T’as perdu du poids. - D’habitude, en taule...- Tu veux quoi, Dan ?

translation.en: What’s up, Dan?
translation.fr: - D’habitude, en taule...- Tu veux quoi, Dan ?

translation.en: How’s that for manners after all I’ve done for you?
translation.fr: C’est ça, ta façon de me remercier ?

translation.en: Six years in county beats 12 years in the state house.
translation.fr: Mieux vaut 6 ans aux frais du Comtéque 12 ans au Fédéral.

translation.en: Those boys down there would’ve spread you out like my crazy aunt’s quilt.
translation.fr: Tu te serais fait défoncer là-bas.

translation.en: Yeah, that was Manny’s grease, not yours.
translation.fr: Manny a graissé les pattes, pas toi.

translation.en: -Speaking of the king... -[can hits bench]
-I didn’t ask for this. -So give it back.
You heard about Manny?
What?
Cancer.
In the butt. Matter of time now.
Well, he had a good run. Junior can steer things now.
translation.fr: Il a eu une belle vie.Junior va prendre le relais.

translation.en: Nothin’ to do with me.
-Clean slate, huh? -Oh, yeah.
Well, I hate to break it to you, but you’re on the hook here, Joey.
translation.fr: Désolé de te le dire,mais il te reste du taf.

translation.en: Manny’s gotta go.
You said cancer.
translation.fr: Tu dis qu’il a le cancer.

translation.en: Before then. Now. Yesterday.
Fuck are you talking about?
That old-time religion.
Old man’s found God.
Cravin’ salvation by way of confession.
translation.fr: Il veut le salut par la confession.

translation.en: Bullshit. He’d never flip.
Old Manny wouldn’t, but dying’s made him smaller.
translation.fr: L’ancien Manny, non,mais la mort l’a diminué.

translation.en: So let’s consider now specifically the kinds of things that he might confess to.
translation.fr: Alors, voyons maintenantce qu’il pourrait confesser.

translation.en: Say, vis-à-vis, you.
translation.fr: Par rapport à toi, par exemple.

translation.en: Yeah. Now you’re seein’ it.
You think Phil’s comment about Bill Caldwell was coincidental?
translation.fr: Pourquoi Phil a-t-il parléde Bill Caldwell ?

translation.en: -Manny’s talking to Phil? -Crazy, right?
translation.fr: - Manny parle à Phil ?- Dingue, hein ?

translation.en: First he wants Phil hit, then his asshole’s melting and he wants to give him absolution.
translation.fr: Il veut faire buter Phil et à sa mort,demande l’absolution.

translation.en: Christ forgives. The sinner is saved. All of that.
translation.fr: Jésus pardonne. Le pécheur est sauvé.Tout ça.

translation.en: Phil’s nudging him towards a deposition, and if he lives long enough, a grand jury.
translation.fr: S’il vit assez longtemps, Phil le feratémoigner devant un grand jury.

translation.en: But even if not, you’d be inside so fast, your bunk would still be warm.
translation.fr: Même sans ça,tu retourneras coucher en taule.

translation.en: And no favors this time.
What do we do?
“We”? You got a turd in your pocket?
You know, Phil’s been trying to butt-fuck you since forever,
translation.fr: Phil a toujours voulu ta peauet si Manny jacte

translation.en: and if Manny sings, he can do it.
And if you do get keistered, I’d worry I’m next in line, and let me tell you what ain’t gonna happen.
translation.fr: Si tu te fais baiser, je serai le suivantet je ne laisserai pas faire.

translation.en: If I was gonna roll over, wouldn’t I do that before serving my fucking time?
translation.fr: Avoir voulu parler,je l’aurais fait avant d’être jugé, non ?

translation.en: -I did the job they wanted-- -No, half the job. Semantics.
translation.fr: - J’ai fait ma part...- Non, la moitié.

translation.en: -Fuck you. I took the fall. -[engine starts]
translation.fr: Va te faire foutre. J’ai plongé.

translation.en: You be sure and send her some flowers now, son.
translation.fr: N’oublie pas de lui envoyer des fleurs.

translation.en: The point is, you left Phil breathing all those years ago, or it wouldn’t be a problem now.
translation.fr: Si tu n’avais pas laissé Phil en vie,on en serait pas là.

translation.en: The way I see it, it’s your mess.
But hey, I’m more into carrots than sticks, so...
translation.fr: Mais je préfère la carotte au bâtonalors...

translation.en: let’s talk about your girls instead.
Junior high by now, hmm?
Family court judge by the name of Winthrop
translation.fr: Un soir, un juge du nom de Winthrop

translation.en: found himself “over-served” one evening a while back.
And he dented up the front of his Prius with the skull of an address-free citizen.
translation.fr: Et il a bugné sa berlineavec le crâne d’un SDF.

translation.en: You might say I helped him sweep that up.
translation.fr: On peut dire que je l’ai sauvé.

translation.en: And I know that he would fall all over himself doing me a favor in return.
translation.fr: Et je sais qu’il me renverrait bienl’ascenseur.

translation.en: Like revising your custody deal, for instance,
translation.fr: Il pourrait par exemple te permettre

translation.en: so you can see your daughters again.
What am I thinking? I gotta drive.
translation.fr: À quoi je pense ? Je conduis.

translation.en: Manny goes. You get your girls back. That’s the carrot.
translation.fr: Bute Manny et revois tes filles.Belle carotte.

translation.en: The stick? Who wants to think about that?
translation.fr: Et le bâton ? À quoi bon y penser ?

translation.en: Do it fast.
Answer me on that if I call.
-Don’t make me come after you. -[engine starts]
translation.fr: Et me force pas la main.

translation.en: He lives.
Hi, Mom.
Oh, I guess you needed the rest. That’s okay.
translation.fr: Tu avais besoin de te reposer. Ça va.

translation.en: -Is that a bruise? -Oh, no.
That was there already. From a door.
-You need a hand? -Nah. Makin’ soup.
[Joe groans] Hard time sleeping.
-Well, this is a big adjustment. -Mmm.
Give it time.
I’m sorry I wasn’t here when you arrived. I--
translation.fr: Désolée de ne pas avoir été là hier.

translation.en: -I, uh-- I already told him. -It’s okay. It’s okay. [groans]
translation.fr: Je... lui ai déjà dit. Ça va.

translation.en: -Got our wires crossed, I guess. -Hmm.
-What are your-- -Dad says--
-Sorry. Go ahead. -No, no, you first.
I was just wondering what are your plans for work.
translation.fr: Je me demandais ce que tu allais fairepour travailler ?

translation.en: [Joe] I haven’t been home a day yet.
It’s a reasonable question.
Your first night home and you’re out till dawn
translation.fr: Tu rentres à peine et tu sors déjà tard

translation.en: with your father’s truck.
I just don’t want things going back to how they were.
translation.fr: Je ne tiens pas à revenirà notre vie d’avant.

translation.en: Not here.
Dad says you don’t speak to your grandchildren.
translation.fr: Donc,tu ne parles pas à tes petites-filles ?

translation.en: [Joe’s mom] That’s Elaine’s decision.
We just want what’s best for them.
translation.fr: On veut juste faire au mieux pour elles.

translation.en: What about me?
It’s impossible to you that I might have changed?
translation.fr: C’est impossible de croireque j’ai changé ?

translation.en: You know...
every Sunday in church...
I have to see Phil Coakley.
And everybody there sees me seeing him.
translation.fr: Et tout le monde voit que je le vois.

translation.en: Have you ever thought what that might feel like... to me?
translation.fr: Tu t’es déjà demandé ce que ça pouvaitme faire... à moi ?

translation.en: Have you changed?
You know what this is?
You expect me to be impressed ’cause you didn’t drink in jail?
Dad! Come on!
Look, see, this is complicated.
No, it’s not.
You say you’ve changed. Good. I hope it’s true.
translation.fr: Tu as changé ? Bien.J’espère que c’est vrai.

translation.en: I’ve prayed for it long enough.
I’m happy you’re home, and I love you,
translation.fr: Je suis ravie de te revoir et je t’aime...

translation.en: but you don’t get extra points for doing what’s simply required,
translation.fr: mais tu n’as pas de bonuspour avoir réussi l’ordinaire,

translation.en: what everybody else does.
-I can’t believe this shit. -You have work to do, Joe!
translation.fr: - Incroyable.- Il te reste fort à faire !

translation.en: I am profoundly sorry, Phil.
Bill Caldwell. Billy was my friend.
translation.fr: Bill Caldwell. Billy était mon ami.

translation.en: And I just wish he’d-- he’d...
worked the steps.
Hi, Phil.
I was out of line, the way I spoke to you last night.
translation.fr: Je n’aurais pas dû te parler comme çahier soir.

translation.en: I thought about this a lot,
what I wanted to say to you when I finally saw you,
translation.fr: à ce que je te diraisquand je te reverrais...

translation.en: and that wasn’t it.
What I did wanna say was that I am profoundly sorry.
translation.fr: Je voulais te dire que je suisprofondément navré.

translation.en: I was truly in fear for my life.
translation.fr: J’ai vraiment craint pour ma vie.

translation.en: I felt I was defending myself,
but that doesn’t excuse the--
I don’t even remember it. Insane.
translation.fr: Je ne m’en souviens même plus.C’est dingue.

translation.en: -Which is it? -Which?
You were in fear for your life or you don’t remember.
translation.fr: Tu craignais pour ta vieou tu ne te souviens plus ?

translation.en: Which is it?
The point is, I do take responsibility,
and I’m ready to move ahead with a-- with a clean life, a good life.
translation.fr: et je veux mener...une vie saine, une bonne vie.

translation.en: Take responsibility and just--
You know. Amends.
You mentioned Bill Caldwell.
translation.fr: Tu as parlé de Bill Caldwell.

translation.en: He was my friend. I loved him.
translation.fr: Il était mon ami. Je l’adorais.

translation.en: I just wish he’d gotten into the program like I have,
translation.fr: J’aurais aimé qu’il suive le programme,comme moi,

translation.en: worked the steps.
There’s a whole other world you can live in.
translation.fr: Il existe un tout autre monde.

translation.en: He just didn’t know.
You are within 100 yards of my home here.
translation.fr: Tu es à moins de 100 m de chez moi.

translation.en: But I’m not interested in some chickenshit restraining order violation.
translation.fr: Mais je me fous que tu violesune putain d’injonction.

translation.en: For you, I want the needle.
translation.fr: Pour toi, je veux la peine de mort.

translation.en: -And I’m gonna get it. -Okay.
Okay.
“Anger eats the vessel.”
[man] I guess you heard, huh?
How’s he doing?
Can I, um--?
He took care of me in there.
translation.fr: Il a pris soin de moi.

translation.en: You’re on the same drugs as me.
translation.fr: Tu prends la même came que moi.

translation.en: -How you feeling? -Eh.
I’m working on my anger.
-What? -Oh, nothing.
That’s not something I thought I’d ever hear you say.
translation.fr: Je ne pensais jamais t’entendre dire ça.

translation.en: [chuckles] What’d it ever get me?
All this. Lots of things.
Yeah, well, I don’t want ’em anymore.
Dan gave me a bag.
-You did your bid. -Yeah.
But I blew the job.
And I warned you about the drinking and the drugs.
translation.fr: Je t’avais averti pour l’alcoolet la drogue.

translation.en: You did.
I should’ve listened, but since I didn’t...
translation.fr: J’aurais dû t’écouter, mais non et donc...

translation.en: I guess I was expecting someone to clip me in there,
translation.fr: je m’attendais à ce qu’on me buteen taule,

translation.en: -not pay me when I came out. -[laughs]
translation.fr: pas à être payé à la sortie.

translation.en: If you knew how much it cost
translation.fr: Si tu savais combien ça a coûté

translation.en: to sell that imperfect self-defense line. [laughs]
translation.fr: pour faire gober que tu avais agien légitime défense.

translation.en: Manny, come on.
Yeah, I admit.
I was angry about Phil.
You blew our clean shot at him. Hmm.
translation.fr: Tu as gâché notre meilleure occase.

translation.en: But since you’d already taken care of Billy...
translation.fr: Mais puisque tu avais déjà régléle cas de Billy...

translation.en: even though he went over to them...
translation.fr: Même s’il avait changé de camp...

translation.en: he was your boy.
So that meant something.
translation.fr: Alors, ça voulait dire quelque chose.

translation.en: I bet Junior disagreed, huh?
Yeah, well, Junior has a lot of--
a lot of different ideas about a lot of things.
Funny you mention talking to Phil.
translation.fr: C’est drôle que tu parles de Phil.

translation.en: -Give me that fuckin’ thing. I hurt. -In a sec.
Because what I hear,
there’s this notion floating now that maybe Billy wasn’t an accident.
translation.fr: que la mort de Billyn’aurait pas été accidentelle.

translation.en: -There’s always talk. -Manny.
Are you talking to the DA? Huh?
You know, sometimes when I’m sleeping...
translation.fr: Tu sais, parfois quand je dors...

translation.en: I think I see what hell looks like...
translation.fr: je vois à quoi ressemble l’enfer...

translation.en: and it ain’t fire and it ain’t devils.
translation.fr: et il n’y a pas de flammes ou de diable.

translation.en: You know what it is?
It’s just me.
And I ain’t no goddamn stool pigeon.
translation.fr: Et je ne suis pas un putain d’indic.

translation.en: I’m sorry.
I don’t know. I...
It’s been a tough few days, is all.
[Manny] Tough, yeah.
Tough for everybody.
[Joe] He nodded out. Pressed the thing there and just...
translation.fr: Il s’est endormi. J’ai appuyé et...

translation.en: It’s the pain. We upped the dosage.
translation.fr: On a augmenté la dose pour la douleur.

translation.en: We should probably let him rest.
Of course. Of course.
I’m Joe.
Old friend.
So how is he-- I mean, it’s bad, huh?
I’m a hospice worker.
Yeah, well, he’s a fighter.
Thank you for taking care of my friend.
translation.fr: Merci de vous occuper de mon ami.

translation.en: You’re gonna sit there with your stupid fuckin’ shirt and tell me I can’t see my own father?
translation.fr: Tu vas m’empêcher de parler à mon père ?

translation.en: My kids can’t go?
He just wants you to call first, Junior, that’s all.
translation.fr: Il veut juste que tu appelles d’abord.

translation.en: Oh, I see.
Did this cocksucker call first?
translation.fr: Ce trou du cul a-t-il appelé d’abord ?

translation.en: Hey, Junior.
-[boy] I thought we were gonna see Poppy. -[Joe] Wow.
translation.fr: Je pensais qu’on allait voir papy.

translation.en: [Junior] Go inside and play the quiet game, okay?
Oh, man. You guys are so big.
[Junior] Hey, close that door behind you. The A/C’s on, all right?
translation.fr: Fermez la porte. Pour la clim.

translation.en: -Goddamn, they grow so fast. -Yeah, how you doin’, Joe?
translation.fr: - Ils grandissent vite.- Ça va, Joe ?

translation.en: Now, you lay there with your hands on your scrotum and you listen.
translation.fr: Garde tes mains sur tes couilleset écoute-moi bien.

translation.en: You are not welcome here.
translation.fr: On veut pas de toi, ici.

translation.en: This is a family time,
and this family no longer has any use for dumb-fuck, grief-causing policemen.
translation.fr: et cette famille n’a pas besoin d’un flicqui fout la merde partout.

translation.en: Now, you come around here again bothering my father,
translation.fr: Si tu reviens déranger mon père...

translation.en: disturbing his rest...
and I’m gonna bring you down to my playroom.
translation.fr: on ira voir ma salle de jeu.

translation.en: Yeah. You know what happens there.
translation.fr: Et tu sais à quoi on y joue.

translation.en: -All right. Come on. Let’s get up. -[groaning]
I think we’d all feel better if you moved on.
translation.fr: Ça ira mieux quand tu auras dégagé.

translation.en: Any idea what Phil Coakley talks to your dad about?
translation.fr: Tu sais de quoi Phil Coakley causeavec ton père ?

translation.en: Besides the Bible, I mean.
translation.fr: À part la bible, bien sûr.

translation.en: Now, why would you say something like that?
I mean, all these years my father carries your crazy ass,
translation.fr: Mon père t’aide pendant toutes ces annéeset là,

translation.en: you’re implying he’s some kind of rat or something?
translation.fr: Mon père t’aide pendant toutes ces annéeset là, tu me dis qu’il est un indic ?

translation.en: All right. Yo, break this motherfucker’s mouth.
translation.fr: Bon. Cassez la gueule à ce connard.

translation.en: Hi.
Uh, can I have a coffee, please?
Thank you.
Oh, hi.
Here.
Thank you.
No, thank you for taking care of my friend.
translation.fr: Merci à vous de veiller sur mon ami.

translation.en: You said that already.
Are you from Bradley originally?
I moved from Montreal around two years ago.
translation.fr: Je suis arrivée de Montréal il y a 2 ans.

translation.en: -You got family? -No.
I-- Well, uh, no.
Do you work there every day at Manny’s house?
translation.fr: Vous travaillez tous les jourschez Manny ?

translation.en: -Six days a week usually. -Hmm. Wow.
And all of his-- I don’t know--
uh, medication and monitoring and all that, that’s all you?
translation.fr: Et... Je ne sais pas... les médocs et tout ça, c’est vous aussi ?

translation.en: That’s me.
And another girl. We do split shifts.
translation.fr: Et une autre fille. On partage.

translation.en: Wow. That must feel like a big responsibility.
I guess it is. I don’t feel overwhelmed.
translation.fr: J’imagine. Je ne l’ai jamais vu comme ça.

translation.en: But I’m good at helping people.
I guess your agency provides you with supplies and medication and whatnot for there at the house.
translation.fr: J’imagine que votre agencevous fournit les médocs pour les soins.

translation.en: My father had lymphoma.
And... [sighs]
They had him on so much different stuff there.
translation.fr: on lui a fait prendre tant de trucs.

translation.en: At the end...
he didn’t know what day it was.
translation.fr: il ne savait plus où il était.

translation.en: -I’m sorry. It’s a terrible disease. -Yeah.
Actually, I just moved back here myself.
Everyone’s gone now.
I was, uh, doing some consulting--
-What the fuck? -Sergeant Thom Doyle,
retired, IUPA local.
translation.fr: à la retraite, syndicat de l’IUPA.

translation.en: And you, sir, are a worthless goddamn punk.
translation.fr: Et vous, monsieur, êtes un minable voyou.

translation.en: I think I’m gonna skip this one.
Do you think you might wanna get together again?
Like I said, everyone’s gone now, and...
translation.fr: Comme j’ai dit, tout le monde est partiet...

translation.en: I like you.
You know, if you want, I could set you up with Toni.
translation.fr: Si tu veux, je peux te maquer avec Toni.

translation.en: Little, uh, welcome-home toss?
translation.fr: Un peu...de cul pour célébrer ton retour ?

translation.en: You know we take care of cops here.
Hell, your old buddy, he’s on a weekly.
translation.fr: Ton vieux pote est un abonné.

translation.en: Bruno. Fuck. Get that fucker out of here.
All right, come on.
Get the fuck out.
-Who’s the peacock? -It’s her old man.
translation.fr: - C’est qui ce con ?- Son père.

translation.en: They got this whole jealousy thing going.
Anyway, if you wanna spend some time with Toni, it’s on me.
translation.fr: Si tu veux baiser Toni, je régale.

translation.en: -Pass. -Suit yourself.
Hey, you want any, uh--? [snorts]
Oh, no, thanks.
[man on TV] Marion Barry tonight delegated many of his duties
translation.fr: Marion Barry a délégué ses fonctions

translation.en: as mayor of the nation’s capital but did not resign.
translation.fr: comme maire de la capitale,mais n’a pas démissionné.

translation.en: The word of this came hours after the DC mayor was brought before a federal magistrate--
translation.fr: Et ceci, peu aprèsque le maire a comparu devant un juge...

translation.en: Excuse me.
That is not your vehicle.
Oh, Dad-- Dad said it was fine.
Where have you been all day? And why are you rushing in like this?
translation.fr: Où as-tu passé la journée ? Que fais-tu ?

translation.en: For your information, I went to a meeting.
translation.fr: Pour tout te dire,je suis allé à une réunion.

translation.en: -Where? -What?
Where was the meeting you were at?
I-- It’s anonymous, Mom.
We’re not gonna do things like this. I’m telling you right now.
translation.fr: Ça ne va pas marcher comme ça.Je t’avertis.

translation.en: -I’m doing everything I can! -All right, okay.
translation.fr: - Je fais ce que je peux !- D’accord.

translation.en: I wish I could believe you, Joe, but you make it so hard.
translation.fr: J’aimerais te croire,mais tu ne m’aides pas.

translation.en: No. You make it so hard, because you don’t want to believe in me.
translation.fr: Tu ne m’aides pasparce que tu ne veux pas croire en moi.

translation.en: I said “believe,” not “believe in.”
translation.fr: J’ai dit “te croire”, pas “croire en toi”.

translation.en: -[Joe] See? -Now, listen.
The onus is on you.
translation.fr: La balle est dans ton camp.

translation.en: What difference does it make when you’re determined to judge me?
translation.fr: La balle est dans ton camp. À quoi bon si ton idée est faite ?

translation.en: Could I have some support here, please?
Oh, no, wait, wait. Mom.
Fuck it. I’ll be gone soon anyway.
What’s that supposed to mean?
This behavior is precisely why you lost your family, Joseph!
translation.fr: C’est ce comportement qui t’a mista famille à dos, Joseph !

translation.en: -Would you like another one? -No, thanks.
What?
Thank you.
For asking me here.
I don’t usually-- And... [sighs]
Feels nice.
Like I said, I like you.
translation.fr: Comme j’ai dit, vous me plaisez.

translation.en: Me too.
So, Montreal.
What prompted the move south?
Polarity.
[clears throat] Weather systems.
-Why does anyone do anything? -I don’t know.
Do you ever feel like you’re living in the wrong skin?
translation.fr: Vous avez déjà pensé être un autre ?

translation.en: Sometimes I’ll wake up in the middle of the night
translation.fr: Parfois, je me réveille la nuit,

translation.en: and I’ll go to get a glass of water,
translation.fr: Parfois, je me réveille la nuit, je vais boire un verre d’eau,

translation.en: and I’ll just catch myself in the mirror, and I don’t recognize myself at all.
translation.fr: je me vois dans une glaceet je ne me reconnais pas du tout.

translation.en: It’s like someone else has come into my bathroom and just stood there.
translation.fr: C’est comme s’il y avaitquelqu’un d’autre dans la pièce.

translation.en: Does that ever happen to you?
Sure.
-[salsa playing] -Do you--?
I-- [clears throat] I’m just gonna go...
Do you-- Do you want a drink or something?
Okay. And you?
Just... Okay.
I like your place.
It’s what I have.
-Cheers. -[clinking]
Why me?
’Cause you’re good.
[Joe] I think everything happens for a reason, you know?
translation.fr: Il y a une raison pour tout, tu sais ?

translation.en: Like what?
Meeting you.
-[chuckles] -No, really. I--
I’ve been having kind of a hard time.
translation.fr: Ça n’a pas été facile récemment.

translation.en: Just alone, you know?
Things... just f-feel different now.
-Hmm. -Hope that’s not weird to say.
translation.fr: J’espère que ça ne fait pas bizarre.

translation.en: [sighs] Anyways, so, yeah.
Do you have any other clients?
Other than Manny, I mean.
I noticed you had, I don’t know, looked like, uh...
translation.fr: J’ai remarqué qu’il y a des produits pharmaceutiques là-dedans.

translation.en: -[sighs] -...pharmaceuticals or something in there.
The reason I ask is because, before I moved back,
translation.fr: Je demande parce qu’avant mon retour,je consultais

translation.en: one of the firms I was consulting for had this guy--
translation.fr: pour une société où un mec...

translation.en: No, it’s true. He was-- Really--
Really? “Consulting”?
You were in jail.
It was in the paper.
Your picture was in the paper.
translation.fr: Ta photo était dans le journal.

translation.en: “Slash Cop,” it said, which just is...
translation.fr: Avec “Tueur” en gros titre, ce qui est...

translation.en: What happened?
[sighs] Didn’t you read it?
I’m asking you.
I was very drunk. Um--
Coming home from a place downtown.
translation.fr: en revenant d’un bar en ville.

translation.en: Apparently I bumped into him, the lawyer.
And, uh--
There was a fight, and I hurt him. Badly.
translation.fr: On s’est battu, je l’ai blessé. Grave.

translation.en: -It said you had a knife. -I thought he was gonna--
translation.fr: - Avec un couteau.- Je pensais qu’il...

translation.en: It was dark, and I-I-I, um--
If you knew...
Because I know what it means to need a second chance.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que c’est d’avoir besoind’une seconde chance.

translation.en: And I didn’t know you when you did those things.
translation.fr: Je ne te connaissais pasquand tu as fait ça.

translation.en: I know you now.
[Dan on phone] Didn’t wake your girl, did I?
I was hoping I would’ve heard some sort of “In Memoriam” item by now
translation.fr: Je pensais que j’aurais déjà lula nécrologie

translation.en: about our mutual patron.
I fucking tried. Junior was there.
translation.fr: J’ai essayé. Mais Junior était là.

translation.en: -Whoa. -Yeah, exactly.
I can’t get that close again.
If anything other than cancer happens to Manny, I’ll be the first one he comes after.
translation.fr: S’il ne crève pas du cancer,je serai le premier soupçonné.

translation.en: Figure it out. [exhales]
Put in some work instead of gettin’ your dick wet.
I was working. She’s the nurse there.
translation.fr: Je bossais. Elle est son infirmière.

translation.en: -Oh. Good thinkin’. -Yeah. Except that won’t work either.
translation.fr: - Bien pensé.- Ça ne fonctionnera pas.

translation.en: -Why not? -It just... won’t.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi pas ?- Parce que... c’est tout.

translation.en: There’s no access. Trust me.
[sighs] All that matters is that there isn’t a case brought against you.
translation.fr: Il ne faut juste pasqu’on puisse t’impliquer.

translation.en: Phil is the only one eager to throw bombs,
and everybody else knows that the Vasseys are good for business.
So if you can’t clip Manny, clip the mutant.
translation.fr: Alors, si tu ne peux pas buter Manny,bute ce connard.

translation.en: There’s no time left. Just make it look right, is all.
[Joe’s mom] Joe! Pick up the phone. It’s for you.
-Yeah. -[man on phone] Joseph Denton?
-Yeah. -This is Anthony Getman
translation.fr: - Joseph Denton ?- Oui. Anthony Getman, de Bradley.

translation.en: with the Bradley Post-Release Program.
You have your office check-in and urinalysis appointment today.
translation.fr: Vous devez passer votre test d’urine.

translation.en: -[sniffs] -Hello?
Yes, sir. I’ll be right there.
Fuck.
-[Scotty] Hello? -It’s Joe.
-I need your help. -Who is it?
-Oh, hey, man. Come on up. -[door buzzes]
[Scotty] Seriously, Joe, it’s no problem.
Positive?
The, uh, reserves piss test randomly, so I, uh...
translation.fr: L’armée aime tester alors,je m’en tiens...

translation.en: stick to booze.
-You can keep the cup. [chuckles] -[chuckling]
-Thanks, man. I owe ya. -No.
Hey, Joe, can I ask you something straight up?
translation.fr: Je peux te demander un truc ?

translation.en: Sure.
Back then was there ever any, uh--
I don’t know--
any talk about what happened to Billy maybe wasn’t an accident?
translation.fr: que Billy n’avait pas été victimed’un accident ?

translation.en: I mean,
we all know he was a lush, but falling asleep on the tracks?
translation.fr: on sait tous qu’il buvait,mais s’endormir sur les rails ?

translation.en: Wasn’t my case, but I knew the guys who drew it. They worked it right.
translation.fr: Je connais les enquêteurs.Ils ont bien bossé.

translation.en: Why, um...
Why now?
Phil Coakley called me. He wants me to come in.
translation.fr: Phil Coakley m’a appelé. Il veut me voir.

translation.en: Mm-hmm. He say why?
He said they’re gonna impanel a grand jury and, uh, reopen it as a homicide.
translation.fr: Ils convoquent un grand jurypour requalifier l’affaire en homicide.

translation.en: Based on what?
“New information” is all he would say.
translation.fr: Il a juste parlé de “nouvelles infos”.

translation.en: It’s like he wanted to dangle it in front of my face.
Fuckin’ prick.
Whatever Phil says he’s got, it’s smoke. He’s fishing.
translation.fr: Phil te fait marcher. Il va à la pêche.

translation.en: He’s got a hard-on for the Vasseys. Always has.
translation.fr: Il a toujours eu les Vasseydans le viseur.

translation.en: There was talk about Junior, maybe he’d been around the tracks that night.
translation.fr: On a dit que Junior traînaitprès des rails ce soir-là.

translation.en: But they could never back it up. It was what it was.
translation.fr: Mais il n’y a pas de preuve. C’est tout.

translation.en: A shitty accident, like you said.
translation.fr: Un accident de merde, comme t’as dit.

translation.en: I’m sorry, man.
I never liked Phil anyway.
I was glad when you fucked him up.
translation.fr: J’étais ravi que tu le coupes.

translation.en: Thanks, man. All right.
Hey, buddy.
-Hey, fellas! -Hey, Dan!
Yeah, now he gets it.
Get it all out.
-Okay. -[retches]
Up you go. Come on.
This thing works pretty good, huh?
Now, I didn’t wake up in this mood.
translation.fr: Je ne me suis pas réveillé fâché.

translation.en: I was thinking, “Don’t worry. My pal Joey will carry his water on this thing.”
translation.fr: Je me disais, “T’en fais pas.Ton pote Joey va assurer.”

translation.en: But then I hear, uh, no.
translation.fr: Puis, on me dit que... non.

translation.en: This Caldwell grand jury is, uh, in motion after all.
translation.fr: Le grand jury a été convoqué.

translation.en: -I know. -Did I tell you time was short?
translation.fr: - Je sais.- J’avais pas dit que ça urgeait ?

translation.en: Did I tell you what was coming? And what did you do but fuck around.
translation.fr: J’avais pas annoncé la couleur ?Et toi, t’as rien foutu.

translation.en: I’ll just take my chances in court.
translation.fr: Je vais prendre une chance en cour.

translation.en: Buddy, you know I wouldn’t be able to let you do that.
translation.fr: Je peux pas te laisser faire ça.

translation.en: Then I’ll run.
Well, that either. Do I need to recharge your battery?
translation.fr: Ça non plus. Tu veux une recharge ?

translation.en: F-Fu-- I can’t do Manny. I can’t do Phil.
translation.fr: Je peux pas buter Manny. Ni Phil.

translation.en: You name a third way or get the fuck out.
translation.fr: Trouve autre chose ou alors, dégage.

translation.en: I just bought a new gas grill.
Stainless steel. Got an infrared system on it.
translation.fr: En inox. Avec un système infrarouge.

translation.en: To be honest, I don’t even know what that means.
translation.fr: Je sais même pas à quoi ça sert.

translation.en: But if you think that I wouldn’t buy some crackhead nigger
translation.fr: Mais si tu crois que je me paierai pasun SDF black

translation.en: for 500 bucks to come into your parents’ house
translation.fr: à 500 balles pour aller chez tes parents

translation.en: and slit their throat while they sleep...
translation.fr: et les égorger dans leur lit...

translation.en: if it meant that I got to keep that grill, you got me mixed up with somebody else.
translation.fr: pour garder ce four,tu te méprends sur ma personne.

translation.en: Manny’s deposition is Monday morning.
Thirty-six hours.
Now, you fix it before then, or I’ll assume that we’re at odds.
translation.fr: Règle ça avant où alors,on aura un souci tous les deux.

translation.en: And then-- [huffs] goddamn, everything’s on the table.
translation.fr: Et alors... Bon sang, ce sera le bordel.

translation.en: And I really do like your folks.
[Joe] Hey, it’s me.
Hey, hey, hey. How you feelin’ today?
Do you know, I was thinking maybe I’d want to talk to Toni.
translation.fr: Je me disais que je parlerais bien à Toni.

translation.en: -You mentioned preferentials. -Yeah.
translation.fr: - T’as parlé de mon pote.- Ouais.

translation.en: So you know when she sees Dan then?
translation.fr: Tu sais quand elle voit Dan ?

translation.en: Or-- Or where?
Dan? I never mentioned Dan.
I was talking about Phil Coakley.
How else do you think that Frankenstein motherfucker’s getting any pussy?
translation.fr: Comment tu penses que ce Frankensteinarrive à baiser ?

translation.en: [Joe] Where’d you meet him?
[Toni] English Garden Inn, off 68.
Same room or different room?
He had a retainer on number 27, on account of it’s a queen size.
translation.fr: Il aime le lit queen de la 27.

translation.en: -Can you get him to see you again? -I don’t wanna see him.
translation.fr: Tu pourrais le revoir ? Je ne veux pas le revoir.

translation.en: A grand.
Thousand dollars?
Cash. After.
[Joe] I think I can do it.
translation.fr: Je pense que ça y est.

translation.en: [Dan on phone] Good boy. Which one?
Neither.
I got a way to freeze Phil out. Nobody gets hurt.
translation.fr: Je sais comment contrer Phil.Sans le tuer.

translation.en: Oh, girl, did I knock a fuse loose?
translation.fr: Tu veux me faire péter un câble ?

translation.en: I can back him off. No grand jury, no Manny Vassey. It’s done.
translation.fr: Je peux gérer. Pas de grand jury,pas de Manny Vassey. Fini.

translation.en: You must have a hell of a wedge.
Bradley’s most saintly public official. Solicitation, on tape.
translation.fr: Le proc propret de Bradley.En pleine sollicitation. Sur film.

translation.en: Ha! Is that real?
I’m looking at it.
I’ll be goddamned.
Phil’s still got some gas in his tank after all.
translation.fr: Phil a encore de la mine dans le crayon.

translation.en: He is mighty precious about his reputation, but, still, blackmail’s messy, you ain’t careful.
translation.fr: Il tient beaucoup à sa réputation,mais le chantage, c’est une sale affaire.

translation.en: Nobody dies, Dan. It’s clean.
So long as it’s chilled.
It will be.
That’s my boy.
Thanks.
You seem different.
How’s that?
I don’t know.
Lighter.
Things are gonna work out.
Maybe they already have.
I’m gonna have a shower.
All right.
[Toni] I told him I’d see him again if he laid off the Jesus.
translation.fr: J’ai dit que je le reverrais, sans Jésus.

translation.en: He damn near jumped through the phone.
Great. I’ll be right there.
-[knocking] -I’ll call you tonight!
[Charlotte] What?
[commercial announcer] Taurus is the car you’ve been waiting for.
translation.fr: C’est la Taurus que vous attendiez.

translation.en: Sleek, strong, safe.
See the new look Taurus at a dealership near you.
[TV announcer] And now back to our Friday night presentation.
translation.fr: De retour à notre émissiondu vendredi soir.

translation.en: -[door slams open] -[man] Bitch, I knew it!
Police! Stay in your room!
Shit!
I gotta talk to you.
All right.
I read this while you were inside.
translation.fr: J’ai lu ça quand tu étais en taule.

translation.en: I didn’t know there was a name for it.
I have always known since you were little...
translation.fr: Depuis ton enfance,j’ai toujours su qu’il y avait...

translation.en: there was something in you.
And I didn’t do anything about it.
I’ve done a lot of soul-searching...
about my part in what happened to you.
-Dad, you didn’t do anything. -Let me finish.
translation.fr: Papa, t’as rien fait. Laisse-moi finir.

translation.en: That’s what I’m saying.
I didn’t do anything.
I didn’t make you run with wild people.
translation.fr: Je ne t’ai pas trouvé tes potes.

translation.en: I didn’t make you gamble all that money.
translation.fr: Je ne t’ai pas forcé à jouer au casino.

translation.en: I didn’t make you take drugs or drink liquor
translation.fr: Je ne t’ai pas drogué, fait boire

translation.en: or be so goddamn angry all the time, Joe.
translation.fr: ou incité à être si révolté.

translation.en: I knew how you were. I did nothing to help.
translation.fr: Je savais comment tu étais.Je n’ai rien fait.

translation.en: I am sorry, Joe.
For that I am truly sorry.
translation.fr: Pour ça, je suis vraiment navré.

translation.en: But I’ve gotta do something about it now.
translation.fr: Mais là, je dois faire quelque chose.

translation.en: For your mother, for me...
-[sighs] -...maybe for you.
I don’t know.
But this cannot continue.
translation.fr: Mais ça ne peut pas continuer.

translation.en: Give me the keys.
Dad...
Give me the keys.
Tomorrow morning.
You’re gonna have to leave.
Dad, I’m leaving right now.
translation.fr: Papa, je vais partir tout de suite.

translation.en: Where is it?
I will not have dirty money in my house.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas d’argent sale chez moi.

translation.en: It’s not dirty money. It’s my money.
translation.fr: Il n’est pas sale. C’est mon argent.

translation.en: Who keeps that much money in a bag unless it’s dirty money?
translation.fr: Qui garde tout ça en espècessi ce n’est pas de l’argent sale ?

translation.en: You have no right to go through my stuff!
translation.fr: Vous n’avez pas le droit de fouiller !

translation.en: We have every right!
Where did it come from? Where?
What’s the difference? I’m leaving! You get your wish!
translation.fr: Peu importe ! Je pars ! Comme tu veux.

translation.en: My wish is to have my son back.
translation.fr: Ce que je veux, c’est mon fils.

translation.en: -All right-- -I don’t know who you are!
translation.fr: Je ne sais plus qui tu es !

translation.en: -[Joe’s dad] Take it easy, Joe. -Mom.
I’m going. Okay? I’m going.
translation.fr: Je file. D’accord ? Je m’en vais.

translation.en: But I need that bag.
translation.fr: Mais il me faut ce fric.

translation.en: -Mm-mmm. -I am dead without it.
So where is it? Please.
translation.fr: Alors, où est-il ? Je t’en prie.

translation.en: Please.
[Joe] What the fuck?
You...
have been in touch this whole time?
translation.fr: tout le temps restés en contact ?

translation.en: The best thing that ever happened to those girls
translation.fr: Ce qui pouvait arriver de mieuxà ces filles,

translation.en: was to get away from their father.
[Joe’s mom] Remember, you had everything and you destroyed it all!
translation.fr: Souviens-toi,tu avais tout et tu l’as sacrifié !

translation.en: -[Joe] Fuck you! -[Joe’s dad] Just stop!
[Joe] You’ll never hate me as much as I hate myself!
translation.fr: Je me hais déjà bien plus que toi !

translation.en: [Joe’s mom] Oh, no, you don’t!
You don’t get to turn this into a little pity party!
translation.fr: Tu ne vas pas t’apitoyer sur ton sort !

translation.en: This is beyond your little feelings!
[Joe] When did you ever care how I felt?
[Joe’s mom] That’s all I ever cared about! And I don’t hate you!
translation.fr: Je ne pense qu’à ça !Et je ne te hais pas !

translation.en: I hate what you’ve done to this family!
translation.fr: Je hais ce que tu nous as fait !

translation.en: -Where’s the fucking money? -[gunshot]
[distorted] Joe! 911! Joe, call 911!
-[Joe’s mom] Oh! -Call 911, Joe!
-Oh, Jesus Christ, Joe! -Aaah!
Dad?
Dad?
Who did it?
Junior Vassey or-or Dan Pleasant. I don’t know.
translation.fr: Junior Vassey ou Dan Pleasant.Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: Your friends.
You bring mayhem with you, Joe.
I fucked up.
[Joe] Then what happened was...
I got behind with my bookie.
It started slow, ya know, couple of Sundays of bad luck.
Next thing I know, I’m underwater.
translation.fr: Puis, j’ai eu la tête sous l’eau.

translation.en: I kept thinking, “Aw, I’ll sort this out.”
translation.fr: On se dit, “Je vais arranger ça.”

translation.en: [sniffs] “I’ll dig out from this.
My daughters...
when they look at me, when they look at my face, they’ll forgive me.”
translation.fr: en me regardant, elles me pardonneront.”

translation.en: Me and another cop...
a guy named Dan...
we did whatever Manny said, and he said, “Do terrible things.”
translation.fr: on a obéi à Manny et il nous a dit,“Faites des trucs terribles.”

translation.en: Now it--
It’s happening all over again.
He’s gonna talk about all that now, Manny is, and when he does...
translation.fr: Manny va se mettre à table et là...

translation.en: that prosecutor’s gonna give me the death penalty.
translation.fr: ce proc va me condamner à la peinede mort.

translation.en: [sniffs] Assuming Dan doesn’t kill me first.
translation.fr: Si Dan ne me tue pas avant.

translation.en: You don’t know that.
You don’t.
We’re not defined by our pasts.
translation.fr: Le passé ne nous définit pas.

translation.en: You’ve remade yourself. You’ve chosen to be a good man.
translation.fr: Tu t’es refait.Tu as choisi d’être quelqu’un de bon.

translation.en: It’s a choice. That’s all it is.
In prison, uh, there was a chaplain.
translation.fr: En prison... il y avait un aumônier.

translation.en: Chaplain Morris.
And he sat with me for-- for fuckin’ years.
translation.fr: Et il m’a accompagné...pendant toutes ces putain d’années.

translation.en: I’m tellin’ ya, if someone tells you for that long that you can be forgiven...
translation.fr: Quand on te dit pendant aussi longtempsque tu peux être pardonné...

translation.en: You’re the only one who made me feel like maybe he was right.
translation.fr: Grâce à toi,je crois presque qu’il avait raison.

translation.en: He was.
I need money to run.
-Let’s go. -[Joe] Hey, guys.
[Joe] I’m gonna go.
Big time.
But...
you’re gonna see the playroom first.
translation.fr: tu vas voir la salle de jeu.

translation.en: Junior, you don’t have to do this. I-- I swear I’m gonna leave.
translation.fr: Junior, pas besoin de faire ça.Je jure de partir.

translation.en: What-Whatever Phil is gonna do with your Dad had--
translation.fr: Quoi que fait Phil avec ton père...

translation.en: My dad?
My father... is dead.
He was a great man. A king.
translation.fr: Il était un grand homme. Un roi.

translation.en: And...
Well, they’ll never be another one like him, right, fellas?
translation.fr: Il n’y en aura plus comme lui, hein ?

translation.en: -Fuck yeah. -[thug] Hmm. [chuckles]
[stammers] Don’t, don’t! No!
Your girlfriend isn’t the most competent nurse I’ve ever seen.
translation.fr: Ta copine n’est pas la meilleureinfirmière.

translation.en: Jesus Christ, you sound like she did. [laughs]
But don’t worry. You’ll see her again.
translation.fr: T’en fais pas. Tu la reverras.

translation.en: [Joe] Where is she?
Out there.
[Junior] We’re gonna go in there together, you and me.
translation.fr: On y va ensemble, toi et moi.

translation.en: We are gonna go down there and work it all out.
translation.fr: On y va et on va régler tout ça.

translation.en: [Junior] We got all day, don’t we?
There’s nothing to work out. Uh--
translation.fr: Il n’y a rien à régler.

translation.en: I didn’t do anything. It wasn’t me.
That’s not what she said.
[Joe] We don’t have to do this. It wasn’t me.
-All right, come on. -[Joe] No. No! -[thug speaks foreign language] -No. No. No, no, no!
Who the fuck is this?
[Scotty] I’ll kill you, Junior!
[Scotty] Die, motherfucker!
[Scotty] I see you, Junior! I see you back there, bitch!
translation.fr: Je te vois, Junior ! Je te vois, salope !

translation.en: [Scotty laughs] There you go, Junior! There you go!
[Scotty] Get some!
Get some!
Now, Bill is my brother!
[Junior] Suck my cock, you fuckin’ retard!
translation.fr: Suce ma bite, espèce de débile !

translation.en: Fuck it.
[Scotty] Fuck, man.
[Joe] You hold on, okay? You just hold on.
Scotty, you hear me?
Yeah, yeah, I hear you.
Good.
You’re gonna be fine.
-Getting you help. -Yeah?
’Cause...
you were like a brother to Billy.
translation.fr: tu étais un frère pour Billy.

translation.en: That makes you like a brother to me, right?
translation.fr: Donc, tu es mon frère, hein ?

translation.en: That’s right.
Except he didn’t fall on any fucking train tracks, did he?
translation.fr: Sauf qu’il n’est pas tombé sur les rails,hein ?

translation.en: Not the way they said.
You... put him there.
That’s crazy, Scotty. Just--
We’re almost there, okay?
Junior... told you to do it.
translation.fr: Junior... t’a dit de le faire.

translation.en: And you did it.
I talked to Phil about it, you know?
translation.fr: J’en ai parlé à Phil, tu sais ?

translation.en: -He’s not such a bad guy. -Did you--
translation.fr: - Il n’est pas si mal.- Tu as... ?

translation.en: Did you maybe take a shot at my house, Scotty?
translation.fr: Tu as canardé ma demeure, Scotty ?

translation.en: Sorry.
You slick motherfucker, you.
Thought you said your plan was “no bodies.”
But I ain’t complainin’. You do some work on his brakes or what?
translation.fr: Mais je me plains pas.T’as trafiqué ses freins ?

translation.en: His what?
Phil’s car.
-Bitch, I knew it! -[screams]
Motherfucker.
[Dan] Got into a smashup last night. Went up in smoke.
You did it. You’re free.
translation.fr: Tu l’as fait. Tu es libre.

translation.en: Now we’ll get started with the judge, get your girls back.
translation.fr: Maintenant,je m’occupe du juge pour tes filles.

translation.en: Yes, sir, a brand-new day, Joey. A brand-new day.
How is she?
She’s gonna live.
What are you doing?
I’m leaving.
What are you doing with that?
-You want it? -[scoffs]
-What are you doing with it? -I’m taking it to the girls.
translation.fr: - T’en fais quoi ?- Je le donne aux filles.

translation.en: -No, you’re not. -I’m not trying to buy them.
translation.fr: - Pas question.- Pas pour les acheter.

translation.en: Just gonna give it to ’em.
Most of it.
[sighs] See them once more, and then I’ll just-- No, you’re not.
translation.fr: - Une dernière fois et...- Pas question.

translation.en: You are going nowhere near those girls.
translation.fr: Tu ne t’approcheras pas des filles.

translation.en: Money, no money, I don’t care.
translation.fr: Fric ou pas, je m’en fous.

translation.en: You will never be in proximity enough
translation.fr: Tu ne les approcheras plus jamais

translation.en: that your damage and mayhem ever touches them, not even for a second.
translation.fr: avec ta merde et ton malheur,même pas pour une seconde.

translation.en: I promise this to you, Son.
translation.fr: Je te promets ceci, mon fils.

translation.en: This will not happen if I am alive.
translation.fr: Ça n’arrivera pas de mon vivant.

translation.en: Bye, Dad.
I’m... sorry for everything.
No, you’re not listening.
I said it will not happen.
I said no.
Stop me.
